StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
• A result oriented IT professional with 11 years of experience in Software Development, maintenance, support and Team Management • Currently associated with Quovantis Technology as Development Manager and managing a team of 15+ members. • Apart from managing the team, working as individual contributor in mPulse and has worked extensively on Database optimizations, Performance and Security testing • Has hands-on knowledge of Python, Celery, Java, J2ee, Spring, Hibernate, Web services, Database. • Proficient with various phases of SDLC and Agile Methodology with Onsite experience. • Good communication, collaboration and team building skills with proficiency at grasping new technical concepts quickly and utilize the same in a productive manner • Worked extensively on healthcare domain with GE Healthcare, mPulse.
Programming Languages: Java, Pyrhon, J2EE, Jquery, SQL. Technologies and Frameworks: Tornado, AsyncIO, Spring, Hibernate, Restful Web-services, Apache Tomcat, ActiveMQ, Gradle, Redis, Rabbitmq, Celery, Apache Airflow, ElasticSearch Databases:, Postgres.

PositionHistory.Title: Development Manager
PositionHistory.Description: Project Description: mPulse is a SAAS based B2B communication platform for marketers and healthcare organizations which involves multi-channel communications - email, sms, push notifications and secure messages. Tech Stack - Java, Spring, Hibernate, Python, Celery, Rabbitmq, Tornado, Jetty, ElasticSearch Responsibilities: • Client interaction for requirement gathering, understanding business value, conducting demonstrations. • Preparing High Level Design and solutioning of functionalities that are critical for the system. • Solving complex problems pertaining to business requirements. • Owning the entire end-to-end delivery of the Sprint(two weeks cycle). • Managing the team including their aspirations, learning and motivation.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 61% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Java Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project Description:Kaboodle is a social shopping community where people discover, recommend and share products. Kaboodle's powerful shopping tools allow people to organize their shopping through lists, discover new things from people with similar style, get discounts on popular products and find best prices.
Responsibilities: • Worked effectively with design teams to ensure software solutions elevated client side experience. • Worked on implementing document database creation through Apache Lucene • Wrote Selenium testcases to Automate UI testing. Technologies: Java6, Spring, Hibernate, JMS, Apache Lucene

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Java Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project Description: This project aims at providing free flow movement of a patient's electronic medical record from one healthcare institution having one vendor EMR to the other healthcare institution having some other vendor EMR.
Responsibilities: • Carried out requirement specification and information gathering. • Design and develop the web service, which intercept service request from EMR client through SOAP message. • Uses JAXB parser to create patient summary document, conforming to the standard schema and submitted it to the central repository.
Technologies: Java6, Spring Framework, Restful Web Services, JAXB, XML, SQL, JUnit.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 93% of this job

Degree.Comments: • Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science) from GBPUAT, Pantnagar, Uttarakhand, India. • Master of Technology(IT) from IIIT-Bangalore.

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
Sanjeev Kumar / Development Manager Mobile - 9911066909 Email - say.sanjeev@gmail.com
Professional Highlights • A result oriented IT professional with 11 years of experience in Software Development, maintenance, support and Team Management • Currently associated with Quovantis Technology as Development Manager and managing a team of 15+ members. • Apart from managing the team, working as individual contributor in mPulse and has worked extensively on Database optimizations, Performance and Security testing • Has hands-on knowledge of Python, Celery, Java, J2ee, Spring, Hibernate, Web services, Database. • Proficient with various phases of SDLC and Agile Methodology with Onsite experience. • Good communication, collaboration and team building skills with proficiency at grasping new technical concepts quickly and utilize the same in a productive manner • Worked extensively on healthcare domain with GE Healthcare, mPulse.
Programming Languages: Java, Pyrhon, J2EE, Jquery, SQL. Technologies and Frameworks: Tornado, AsyncIO, Spring, Hibernate, Restful Web-services, Apache Tomcat, ActiveMQ, Gradle, Redis, Rabbitmq, Celery, Apache Airflow, ElasticSearch Databases:, Postgres. Operating Systems: Linux, Windows.
Professional Experience Quovantis Technologies 01/2013 to Present Project: mPulse Mobile Role: Development Manager Project Description: mPulse is a SAAS based B2B communication platform for marketers and healthcare organizations which involves multi-channel communications - email, sms, push notifications and secure messages. Tech Stack - Java, Spring, Hibernate, Python, Celery, Rabbitmq, Tornado, Jetty, ElasticSearch Responsibilities: • Client interaction for requirement gathering, understanding business value, conducting demonstrations. • Preparing High Level Design and solutioning of functionalities that are critical for the system. • Solving complex problems pertaining to business requirements. • Owning the entire end-to-end delivery of the Sprint(two weeks cycle). • Managing the team including their aspirations, learning and motivation.
Novamantic Technolgoy 07/2011 to 01/2013 Project: Kaboodle.com Role: Senior Java Developer Project Description:Kaboodle is a social shopping community where people discover, recommend and share products. Kaboodle's powerful shopping tools allow people to organize their shopping through lists, discover new things from people with similar style, get discounts on popular products and find best prices.
Responsibilities: • Worked effectively with design teams to ensure software solutions elevated client side experience. • Worked on implementing document database creation through Apache Lucene • Wrote Selenium testcases to Automate UI testing. Technologies: Java6, Spring, Hibernate, JMS, Apache Lucene
GE Healthcare 06/2007 to 10/2010 Project: Interoperability between EMR. Role: Java Developer Project Description: This project aims at providing free flow movement of a patient's electronic medical record from one healthcare institution having one vendor EMR to the other healthcare institution having some other vendor EMR.
Responsibilities: • Carried out requirement specification and information gathering. • Design and develop the web service, which intercept service request from EMR client through SOAP message. • Uses JAXB parser to create patient summary document, conforming to the standard schema and submitted it to the central repository.
Technologies: Java6, Spring Framework, Restful Web Services, JAXB, XML, SQL, JUnit.
Educational Qualifications • Bachelor of Technology (Computer Science) from GBPUAT, Pantnagar, Uttarakhand, India. • Master of Technology(IT) from IIIT-Bangalore.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Sanjeev Kumar's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Java) and slightly concentrated in Healthcare Non-physician Non-nurse (mostly Allied Health). Sanjeev Kumar has 12 years of work experience, with 7 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a mid-level management role: Development Manager Starting on 1/1/2013, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 7 years: Title: Development Manager for Quovantis Technologies
